item.title: 俄罗斯法院下令扣押 VTB 诉讼案中的摩根大通资金
item.description: 周三的法庭文件显示，俄罗斯法院已下令扣押摩根大通在俄罗斯银行账户中的资金，这是国有银行 VTB 为收回被冻结在国外的资金而提起的诉讼。【原文：A Russian court has ordered the seizure of funds in JPMorgan Chase bank accounts in Russia, court filings showed on Wednesday, in a lawsuit filed by state-owned bank VTB as it seeks to regain funds blocked abroad.】

item.title: 马斯克承诺推出 "更经济实惠 "的汽车，缓解了对特斯拉增长的担忧，特斯拉因此大涨
item.description: 特斯拉股价周三大涨 10%，因为这家电动汽车制造商预测今年的销量将有所增长，并表示将在 2025 年初推出更多经济实惠的车型，从而缓解了人们对其增长的担忧。【原文：Tesla shares surged 10% on Wednesday after the electric-car maker eased some worries about growth with a prediction that sales would rise this year and said it would roll out more affordable models in early 2025.】

item.title: 瑞银对瑞士新的资本要求表示严重关切
item.description: 瑞银集团高管周三向股东表示，该行对瑞士政府最近宣布的计划表示严重关切，瑞士政府将对这家瑞士最大的贷款机构提出更严格的资本要求。【原文：UBS executives on Wednesday told shareholders that the bank has major concerns about the Swiss government's recently announced plan to hit the country's largest lender with tougher capital requirements.】

item.title: 印尼中央银行称中国支付宝+尚未申请许可
item.description: 印尼央行副行长菲利亚宁希-亨达塔（Filianingsih Hendarta）周三在一次新闻发布会上说，中国蚂蚁金服集团旗下的支付宝+公司尚未正式申请在印尼开展业务的许可。【原文：Chinese firm Ant Group's Alipay+ has not formally requested a permit for operations in Indonesia, central bank deputy governor Filianingsih Hendarta told a news conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: SK Hynix 将投资 38.6 亿美元在韩国建设 DRAM 芯片生产基地
item.description: 韩国内存芯片制造商 SK Hynix 周三表示，计划投资 5.3 万亿韩元（38.6 亿美元）在韩国新建一个动态随机存取存储器（DRAM）芯片生产基地。【原文：South Korean memory chipmaker SK Hynix said on Wednesday it plans to invest 5.3 trillion won ($3.86 billion) in a new dynamic random access memory (DRAM) chip production base in South Korea.】

item.title: 马士基可能提供有限的巴尔的摩驳船服务
item.description: 丹麦马士基公司（Maersk）周三表示，在美国巴尔的摩港临时通道开通后，该公司可能会恢复部分航运服务，以便让因桥梁坍塌而受阻的重要商业船只能够进入巴尔的摩港。【原文：Denmark's Maersk may resume some shipping services at the U.S. Port of Baltimore when a temporary channel is opened to give access for commercially essential vessels that remain blocked by a collapsed bridge, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 奢侈品公司警告上半年营业利润下降，开云集团股价暴跌
item.description: 周三，开云集团（Kering）股价暴跌，此前这家法国奢侈品公司警告称，预计上半年营业利润将骤降 40% 至 45%。【原文：Kering's shares slumped on Wednesday, after the French luxury goods company warned it expected a 40% to 45% plunge in first-half operating profit.】

item.title: 中欧紧张局势加剧，Polestar 或利用美国工厂向欧洲销售汽车
item.description: 中国支持的瑞典电动汽车（EV）制造商Polestar Automotive公司首席执行官表示，鉴于地缘政治紧张局势加剧，该公司正准备将计划销往欧洲的汽车生产从中国转移到美国工厂。【原文：Chinese-backed Swedish electric vehicle (EV) maker Polestar Automotive is preparing to shift production of cars it plans to sell into Europe to its U.S. plant from China in view of rising geopolitical tension, its CEO said.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国碧桂园延长债券期限以避免首次地方违约
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司获准推迟偿还三笔人民币债券。【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co won approval to push back payments on three yuan bonds, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车生存游戏带来危险和动力
item.description: 从大多数方面来看，中国最不需要的就是更多的电动汽车挤占市场，让输家多于赢家，以牺牲利润为代价压低价格，并将市场份额的争夺战推向中国以外的地方。【原文：By most measures, the last thing China needs is more electric cars crowding a market with more losers than winners, driving down prices at the expense of profit and taking the fight for market share beyond China.】

item.title: 美国要求判处 Binance 创始人赵某 36 个月监禁
item.description: 美国检察官周二在一份法庭文件中表示，全球最大加密货币交易所 Binance 的创始人赵长鹏在承认违反反洗钱法之后，应在监狱服刑 36 个月。【原文：Changpeng Zhao, the founder of Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, should serve 36 months in prison after pleading guilty to violating laws against money laundering, U.S. prosecutors said in a court filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 丰田丑闻缠身的大发汽车计划今年恢复汽车研发
item.description: 受丑闻影响的丰田汽车子公司大发公司总裁告诉记者，该公司的目标是最早于今年年底全面恢复汽车开发，并表示他在南美和非洲看到了机会。【原文：Scandal-hit Toyota Motor subsidiary Daihatsu aims to fully resume developing vehicles by as early as the end of this year, the president of the compact carmaker told reporters, adding that he saw opportunities in South America and Africa.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车第一季度调整后营业利润增长，成本缓解
item.description: 瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三公布，受材料成本降低和销量增加的影响，第一季度调整后营业利润有所增长。【原文：Swedish automaker Volvo Cars reported a rise in first-quarter adjusted operating earnings on Wednesday, helped by lower material costs and higher volumes.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元岌岌可危，但特斯拉回调
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 由于上市和交易疲软，香港交易所运营商第一季度利润下降 13
item.description: 香港交易所周三公布的第一季度利润下降 13%，降幅小于预期，原因是交易低迷和上市活动减少对其业务造成了影响。【原文：Hong Kong's bourse operator on Wednesday reported a narrower than expected 13% drop in first-quarter profit, as sluggish trading and muted listing activities weighed on its businesses.】

item.title: 中国华为推出智能驾驶新软件
item.description: 中国科技公司华为（HWT.UL）周三发布了一个新的智能驾驶软件品牌，标志着该公司成为电动汽车行业主要参与者的最新努力。【原文：Chinese tech company Huawei (HWT.UL) unveiled on Wednesday a new software brand for intelligent driving, marking its latest push to become a major player in the electric vehicle industry.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受科技股提振上涨；日元受到干预观察
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市追随华尔街上涨，原因是电动汽车制造商特斯拉承诺推出新车型，盘后股价大涨，一些美国公司的乐观财报也提振了风险情绪。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Wednesday, tracking Wall Street, as an after-hours surge in shares of EV maker Tesla following its promise of new models, and upbeat earnings from some U.S. companies lifted risk sentiment.】

item.title: Capital A 与首席执行官费尔南德斯续约五年
item.description: 廉价航空集团亚航（AirAsia）的运营商 Capital A 周三表示，其首席执行官托尼-费尔南德斯（Tony Fernandes）的合同已延长五年。【原文：Capital A, the operator of budget airline group AirAsia, said on Wednesday the contract of its chief executive Tony Fernandes has been extended for the next five years.】

item.title: 中国华为推出智能驾驶新品牌
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为（HWT.UL）周三发布了智能驾驶新品牌。【原文：Chinese tech giant Huawei (HWT.UL) unveiled a new brand for intelligent driving on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，旭化成将在加拿大建设电动汽车电池组件工厂，为本田汽车供货
item.description: 日经新闻》周三称，旭化成计划斥资约 2,000 亿日元（13 亿美元）在加拿大建造一座电池组件工厂。【原文：Asahi Kasei plans to spend about 200 billion yen ($1.3 billion) to build a battery component factory in Canada, the Nikkei newspaper said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 解说：美国 TikTok 法案通过后会发生什么？
item.description: 美国参议院周二通过立法，要求 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动在九个月内剥离该短视频应用在美国的资产，否则将面临全国范围的禁令。乔-拜登总统表示，他将于周三签署该法案，使其成为法律。【原文：The U.S. Senate on Tuesday passed legislation giving TikTok's Chinese owner, ByteDance, about nine months to divest the U.S. assets of the short-video app, or face a nationwide ban. President Joe Biden said he will to sign the bill into law on Wednesday.】

item.title: 马斯克将矛头对准澳大利亚参议员和枪支法律，X 刺伤内容引发的争议日益加深
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）称，一名澳大利亚参议员应被监禁，并暗示该国的枪支法是为了阻止对其 "法西斯政府 "的反抗。【原文：Elon Musk said an Australian senator should be jailed and suggested the country's gun laws were meant to stop resistance against its "fascist government", escalating his battle over a court order to remove video posts of a bishop being stabbed.】

item.title: 数据显示美国原油库存意外下降后，油价稳步上扬
item.description: 周三早盘，油价上涨，延续了前一交易日的涨势，因为行业数据显示上周美国原油库存意外下降，这对需求来说是一个积极的信号，而且人们的注意力也从中东的敌对行动上转移开来。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Wednesday, adding to gains in the previous session, after industry data showed a surprise drop in U.S. crude stocks last week, a positive sign for demand, and attention shifted away from hostilities in the Middle East.】

item.title: 特斯拉转向低成本汽车，墨西哥和印度工厂计划陷入困境
item.description: 特斯拉周二表示，该公司最早将于今年年底利用现有工厂生产价格更低的新型汽车，因此短期内不太可能在墨西哥和印度投资建新厂。【原文：Tesla said on Tuesday that it will use its existing factories to build new and more affordable vehicles as early as late this year, leaving investments in new factories in Mexico and India unlikely in the near term.】

item.title: 欧元反弹后美元震荡；日元跌至 34 年低点
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元和英镑大幅下挫，受欧洲经济活动数据出人意料地强劲和美国商业增长降温的双重影响，美元正在养伤。【原文：The dollar nursed its wounds on Wednesday following big tumbles against the euro and sterling, hurt by a combination of surprisingly robust European activity data and cooling U.S. business growth.】

item.title: 特斯拉Model 3高性能版在中国的售价为46,364美元，将于第三季度交付
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc）最新推出的 Model 3 性能版汽车在中国的售价为 335,900 元人民币（46,364.29 美元）。【原文：Tesla Inc has priced its latest Model 3 performance version vehicle at 335,900 yuan ($46,364.29) in China.】

item.title: 马斯克说，特斯拉可能在明年年底开始销售 "擎天柱 "机器人
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二表示，特斯拉的仿人机器人仍在实验室中，但最快可能在明年年底就可以出售。【原文：Tesla's humanoid robot is still in the lab, but it may be ready to sell as soon as the end of next year, chief executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本 3 月份企业服务通胀率上升
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本 3 月份企业对企业服务通胀率连续第二个月加速上升，达到 2.3%，表明由于工资持续增长的前景，企业继续转嫁不断上升的劳动力成本。【原文：Japan's annual business-to-business service inflation accelerated for the second month to hit 2.3% in March, data showed on Wednesday, suggesting firms continued to pass on rising labour costs thanks to prospects for sustained wage gains.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司第三季度销售收入下降 58
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周三公布其第三季度销售收入下降了 58.3%，原因是稀土价格低迷，而中国作为主要的稀土生产国产量增加，进一步拖累了需求。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths posted a 58.3% drop in its third-quarter sales revenue on Wednesday, hurt by subdued prices for rare earths and increased output in China, a dominant producer, further weighing on demand.】
